summary:
Removes the gray \'depth-fog\' from the map. 
Very simple editor change, should work with any other map mods.
descriptionHtml:
Description: 
Removes the gray \'depth-fog\' from the map. 
Very simple editor change, should work with any other map mods. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install: 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recommendations: 
This mod works with vanilla Skyrim, however, it\'s most noticeable when used with mods that let you zoom much farther out and mods that remove the map clouds. 

Changing the zoom and removing the clouds used to possible by editing: \\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Skyrim.ini 
As of the latest patch, that doesn\'t work. 
I recommend these mods (which I didn\'t create): 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26998/ (used for some of the screenshots) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929/ (a mod for making the map look cool) 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall: 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: uncannychuckles
